headline: Invesco Canada announces fund changes
summary: Changes are proposed for four ETFs and three Mutual FundsTORONTO, Jan. 13, 2025 /CNW/ -- Invesco Canada Ltd. today announced changes to seven Invesco funds.  ...

headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces December 31, 2024 Assets Under Management
summary: ATLANTA, Jan. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Invesco Ltd. today reported preliminary month-end assets under management of $1,846.0 billion, a decrease of 0.6% versus previous month-end. The firm...
